publishingInformation.testingInstructions: You can ask alexa for shabbat times in various cities in the united states, the united kingdom or in israel.

en-US.summary: Would you like to know the shabbat times in your city?
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask shabbat times for help
Alexa, ask shabbat times to list the city names
en-US.name: Shabbat Times
en-US.description: Get the Shabbat start and end times in various cities in the Israel, the United States and the United Kingdom.
